name: Merry Marras
description:
URBAN MORBUS SERIES

It's holiday time and you are full of holiday spirit, but again you left gift shopping to time last minute, great job. You noticed recently abandoned former youth center and decides to scout it for possible "gift ideas" that might had been left behind.  Unlike your other life decisions this one surely won't backfire, right?

Just do your best and try to gather something, nothing more is expected from you.

Notice: I'm aware there is lag/stutter when cutscene starts and ends which should disappear within 1-2 seconds. Will look into fixing issue in future update.

 Game tested on following hardware:

  • CPU: Intel Core i5-8400 (@ 2.80 GHz)
  • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Memory: 16 GB
